  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14739</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">I paesi baltici</string>
            <string language="en">The Baltic countries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die baltischen Länder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pays baltiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os países Báltico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι βαλτικές χώρες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los países bálticos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">1)E' stato dimostrato che i cittadini di altri paesi europei conoscono poco o quasi niente dei nuovi paesi dell'UE, in particolare dei paesi baltici; ecco perchè invito gli allievi a conoscere Lituania, Lettonia ed Estonia.</string>
            <string language="en">1)	It has been proved that the citizens of other European countries know little or almost nothing about the new EU countries, especially the Baltic countries; that is why I invite the pupils to get acquainted with Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">1) ist es, daß die Bürger anderer europäischer 
Länder wenig oder fast nichts über die neuen EU-Länder wissen, 
besonders die baltischen Länder nachgewiesen worden; das ist, 
warum ich die Schüler einlade, mit Litauen, Lettland und Estland 
bekannt zu erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">1) on l'a montré que les citoyens d'autres pays 
européens ne savent peu ou presque rien au sujet des nouveaux pays 
d'EU, particulièrement les pays baltiques ; c'est pourquoi 
j'invite les élèves à devenir au courant de la Lithuanie, de la 
Lettonie et de l'Estonie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1) provou-se que os cidadãos de outros países 
europeus não sabem pouco ou quase nada sobre os países novos do EU, 
especial os países Báltico; isso é porque eu convido os 
alunos começar familiares com o Lithuania, o Latvia e o Estónia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">1) Έχει αποδειχθεί ότι οι πολίτες άλλων 
ευρωπαϊκών χωρών ξέρουν ελάχιστα ή σχεδόν τίποτα για τις νέες
χώρες της ΕΕ, ειδικά οι βαλτικές χώρες  γίαυτό προσκαλώ 
τους μαθητές για να εξοικειωθώ με τη Λιθουανία, τη Λετονία και την
Εσθονία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">1) se ha probado que los ciudadanos de otros 
países europeos no saben poco o casi nada sobre los países nuevos 
del EU, especialmente los países bálticos; ése es porqué 
invito a pupilas que consigan conocidas con Lituania, Latvia y 
Estonia.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

            <string language="x-t-lre">10-U</string>
            <string language="en">> 10</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">1) Lo scopo dell'esercizio è quello di far nascere negli alunni l' interesse per i nuovi paesi europei 2) Gli studenti verificano le loro conoscenze oppure cercano di indovinare di quali informazioni essi siano in possesso riguardo ai tre paesi baltici.</string>
            <string language="en">1)	The aim of the task is to arise the pupils` interest about the new EU countries.
2)The pupils check their knowledge or try to guess what information they have got about the three Baltic countries.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
